title: Smart Data models - GNBDUFunction schema
description: Defines the YANG mapping of the GNBDUFunction Information Object Class (IOC) that is part of the NR Network Resource Model (NRM).

aggressorSetID.description: Property. Indicates the associated aggressor gNB Set ID of the cell Valid when Remote Interference Management function is supported.. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

gNBDUId.description: Property. Uniquely identifies the DU at least within a gNB.. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

gNBDUName.description: Property. Identifies the Distributed Unit of an NR node. Model:'https://schema.org/String'

gNBId.description: Property. Identifies a gNB within a PLMN. The gNB Identifier (gNB ID) is part of the NR Cell Identifier (NCI) of the gNB cells.. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

gNBIdLength.description: Property. Indicates the number of bits for encoding the gNB ID.. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

victimSetID.description: Property. Indicates the associated victim gNB Set ID of the cell Valid when Remote Interference Management function is supported.. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'
